title: Saved Addresses Management Page
technical_notes: Full CRUD UI for addresses with list view, add/edit modal, delete confirmation, and default address selection. Extract shared validation patterns from ShippingAddressForm without modifying it.
security_review: PASSED - Frontend only, relies on authenticated API. Address data displayed only to authenticated owner. Delete confirmation prevents accidental data loss.
approach: AddressList as container, AddressCard for display with edit/delete/default buttons, AddressForm as reusable modal form. Four mutation hooks for CRUD operations.

acceptance_criteria_review.notes: Comprehensive CRUD coverage plus empty state, loading, error, validation, RTL

ui_notes: Must be RTL, Hebrew labels, mobile-first. Default address highlighted with badge. Confirmation dialog for delete.
